subject: Power supply for Haptics
description_text:
Hi
I am looking at adding the haptics to my Plus X pedals and was wondering
what power cable comes with them? As I am in Australia,  will this include
a plug for Australia?

Thank You.

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin Judd,    Please feel free to purchase with confidence. When buying in Australia, we will provide an Australian power adapter free of charge.

That's great, thank you very much.

I have a follow up question on the pricing. Are the prices on the webstore
in USD or AUD?

On Wed, 22 Oct 2025, 3:57 pm support@simsonn.com,
The prices displayed on the website are in US dollars.

Thank you for the clarification.

On Wed, 22 Oct 2025, 4:09 pm support@simsonn.com,
